VC-I.name: VC-I
VC-I.mechDesc: Compare images on both devices. If equal, press OK

VC-N.name: VC-N
VC-N.mechDesc: Compare numbers on both devices. If equal, press OK

VC-P.name: VC-P
VC-P.mechDesc: Compare phrases on both devices. If equal, press OK

SiB.name: SiB
SiB.mechDesc: Scan displayed Barcode with receiving device

LaCDS.name: LaCDS
LaCDS.mechDesc: Compare displayed and synthesized sentence. If equal, press OK

LaCSS.name: LaCSS
LaCSS.mechDesc: Compare both synthesized sentences. If equal, press OK

BEDA_VB.name: BEDA_VB
BEDA_VB.mechDesc: Press button on receiving device simultaneous to vibration

BEDA_LB.name: BEDA_LB
BEDA_LB.mechDesc: Press button on receiving device simultaneous to bright LED

BEDA_BPBT.name: BEDA_BPBT
BEDA_BPBT.mechDesc: Press button on receiving device simultaneous to beeping

BEDA_BTBT.name: BEDA_BTBT
BEDA_BTBT.mechDesc: Randomly Press button on both devices simultaneously

HAPADEP.name: HAPADEP
HAPADEP.mechDesc: Compare words synthesized by both devices. If equal, press OK
